item.title: The Chargers and Close Games
item.description: A Good Way to Lose As a Chargers fan for 20+ years, the last 5ish years have been interesting to say the least. In some ways it has been comical watching coach after coach lead Philip Rivers to an endless line of close defeats. Itâ€™s funny to blame the quarterback, but the failure modes transcend beyond quarterback play. The on-field buffoonery has been written about plenty. Click here for a comprehensive review.
